response.original_title: Cartoon Craze Presents Felix the Cat Woos Whoopee
response.overview: Although it may have been someone's joke for the DVD artwork cover of Felix appearing as he's 'giving the finger', (actually his index finger) that prepares you for some laughs with great classic animation. Parents warning.. Felix becomes intoxicated/drunk in the first film short. 1. Woos Whoopee 2. Forty-Winks 3. Arabianantics 4. False Vases 5. Futuritzy 6. Sculls and Skulls 7. Outdoor Indore
response.tagline: Over an Hour of Classic Animation
response.title: Cartoon Craze Presents Felix the Cat Woos Whoopee
